text:
In front of the main entrance gate always gossiping/gathering 6-7 Myanmar/Indonesian boys drinking Beer/alcohol. It's very harassment while couple wants to check-in hotel.
So please I request to the Hotel authority from today plz don't give permission gathering in front of the hotel.

If it's continuesly going on  visitor/guests will check-in your hotel.

Service is quite bad.. rooms are not maintain as what is mention.
Make up of rooms is not auto..if you wake up late ecessary.. your room will not be clean for at all..

I been wanting to speak to the management of this hotel .
Even they increase the room rate.
They was not black & white or notice..
There is worst

It is an affordable hotel, suits with the service given. It is suitable for couples with a child as the spaces not so big. Not suitable for one big family as the lounge itself not so big hehe. Overall the decorations, the peacefulness &services given is very ok ðŸ¤—
Decent budget hotel if you need to put up for a night in this part of town. Currently offering monthly rental at RM800
